title: Academic Kaffeeklatsch
event_description: Join your German Language Assistants, classmates, and faculty for food, coffee, and conversation. This is a great opportunity to practice your German in a casual and relaxing environment. German speakers of all levels are welcome!

title: CHEMINAR - Senior Thesis Talks (Week 2 of 5)
location: Science Center A011, Kirkpatrick Lecture Hall
event_description: Senior Thesis Talks by Anna Baxter, Kaila Bush, Isabelle Gomez, and Britney Jiang

title: Physics & Astronomy Colloquium: Aurelia Ball
event_description: Join the Physics & Astronomy department as we welcome Aurelia Ball from Skidmore College. Aurelia is presenting a talk titled "Molecular shape-shifters: Using computational biophysics to reveal cellular processes".

title: Extended Course Reserve Loans Through October Break!
event_description: Select reserve items can have due dates extended to 9 AM Wednesday, October 16th!

title: T4Tea
event_description: Join the WGC for the launch of our new series, T4Tea! We’ll be using tea bags as paint mediums to explore our relationships with our queer/trans bodies.

title: CHI Salon - Repairing History
location: CHI Think Tank (Childcare provided in Lyceum 102)
event_description: Artist, visual storyteller, and scholar Kohar Avakian reflects on the relationship between the submerged Nipmuc mishoon and the creations featured in Boundless, an Indigenous art & literature exhibition at the Mead Museum.

title: Business Project Notification: Science Center A Wing Paint Work
event_description: Upcoming paint work in the A Wing of the Science Center, scheduled for October 14th-October 18th

title: Exorcism = Liberation hub at Book & Plow
event_description: An audio experience at Book & Plow, focusing on future-building embedded in Puerto Rican culture and the U.S.’s colonial history in that region.

title: Peer Educator Application with Residential Engagement & Wellbeing
event_description: Apply to be a Peer Educator and be part of a collaborative team, leading programs, workshops, and tables on health and wellbeing topics.

title: Fall Break Wellness & Fitness Class Schedule
event_description: Check the schedule for Fall Break classes, including cancellations and modifications

title: Naloxone Training with REW and Tapestry Health
event_description: Join Residential Engagement & Wellbeing for a lunch-and-learn naloxone training with facilitators from Tapestry Health

title: Admission Office Blogger Application
event_description: Apply to be an Admission Office Blogger and share your Amherst experiences with prospective students
